item.title: Flight Crew Communication Equipment – Dual Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF)

numlitem.para: Alternate procedures are established and used.
Use voice radio, ACARS or other organizations, such as Aeronautical Radio Inc. (ARINC) for communications with Flight Control (FOM Chapter 4).

placard.para: Placard near EICAS "DTMF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
